name: Plight (itch) (Wahaj Hussain)
description:
Jackie is an alchemist in the sleepy town of Mycelcity. Jackie see’s many
customers throughout the day, but today was special. Today, The Lady of the
Land visits Pick n' Pumpkin with a prophecy she only trusts Jackie with. The Lady of the Land speaks of a terrible disease that will rapidly destroy the land and its people. Jackie needs to find a cure swiftly, or Mycelcity will fall victim
to the plight of Dry Bubble.

An evil spore traverses the land. 

Innocents are bubbling up, growing weak and misshaped. 

Stems are splitting, necrotic pockets begin to expand. 

The Bubble spares none, we’ve all been damned 

All except one 

Tiny, but mighty, the world requires they join in 

Take caution! 

Our savior, who lives at the Pumpkin. 

The Bubble will fear you, 

Only if you possess this concoction
